import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PictureService } from 'src/app/services/picture.service'; import { Picture } from 'src/app/shared/models/Pictures'; @Component({ selector: 'app-picture-page', templateUrl: './picture-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./picture-page.component.css'] }) export class PicturePageComponent implements OnInit { pictures: Picture[] = []; constructor(private pictureService: PictureService) { } ngOnInit() { this.loadPictures(); } loadPictures() { this.pictureService.findAll().subscribe( data => { this.pictures = data; }, error => { console.error(error); } ); } fetchUrlContent(url: string) { fetch(url) .then(response => response.text()) .then(data => { console.log(data); // Process the fetched content here }) .catch(error => { console.error(error); }); } }
